frames.text: You are standing on the main road, at the bottom of the track which leads to your house. There are two ways to travel to Athens: go North, around Mount Himetus, or take the Southern road beneath the mountain.
You trudge along the dusty road for a while. Now you're passing the fields where you keep some of your beehives. Mount Himetus looms to the South.
frames.text2: You are on the road between your village and Athens. Mount Himetus looms to the South. Your beehives are in a field nearby.

options.text: Take a detour to inspect your beehives
Follow the road back to your house

frames.text: The road winds out of the mountains from the East. Athens can be seen in the distance, to the West.

options.text: Head back East, towards your village

frames.text: Bees buzz softly in the long grass in the field where your beehives are kept. The hives are lined up in a row.
You open up each hive in turn. The bees haven't produced much honey lately, but there's enough to fill a clay pot.

getItem.name: Honey
getItem.description: Sweet honey from the slopes of Mount Himetus

frames.text: You already took all the honey that was ready. The bees need time to make some more.
The road between your village and Athens winds slowly beneath Mount Himetus' southern slopes. As you trudge along the stony path towards Athens, a gleam underfoot catches your eye.
frames.text2: The road between your village and Athens winds slowly beneath Mount Himetus' southern slopes.

frames.text: It's a coin - a hemiobol, in fact. You tuck it in your pouch

As you walk along the road, you cross a broad valley with olive trees scattered across it. A tiny tavern stands in the middle of the valley, close to the road. A sign outside advertises wine and olive oil for sale.
frames.text2: You are on the road outside a tavern in a broad valley.

frames.text: The road slopes downhill as it approaches Athens. The city's outer edges are just about visible on the southwestern horizon. To the south, you see a little track, barely distinguishable among the rocks. It leads up a steep slope towards what looks like a cave.

options.text: Follow the road back towards your village
Climb the track to the cave

frames.text: You find yourself in a small tavern with a brick floor. It's dark. The innkeeper is stacking plates behind the wooden table which serves as a bar. The tavern is empty, apart from three old men in the far corner, hunched around a table, chewing on bread and olives and muttering in low voices.
frames.text2: You are in a small tavern. The innkeeper is resting on a stool behind the bar.

frames.text: 'Good morning, traveller! On your way to Athens, perhaps? What can I get you? We have bread, oil... and wine of course, but it's a little early for wine, ho ho ho!'
frames.text2: 'Well then, traveller. What would you like?'

options.text: 'Don't shame me for my bad decisions. Give me wine!'

frames.text: 'Wine it is, then! One glass coming right up.'
You're in luck, my daughters just finished baking this morning. Here's a delicious fresh loaf just for you.
frames.text2: Here you are, one loaf of fresh bread.

getItem.name: Loaf of bread
getItem.description: A small loaf of fresh bread from a tavern outside Athens.

frames.text: 'Hm, well, I can't sell you that if you don't have the coin.'
